|brand = Netgear |model = DGN1000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router,dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY309300114 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Infineon;PSB 50601;Lantiq (Intel), AMAZON-SE (PSB 50601 HL V1.2); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 266 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L3205DM2I-12G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM639165TS-6G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/21/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 606449066128 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0036R8FCO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9271; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM SerComm (YR600B-1.6)
See also [[Lantiq]] / [[Infineon]].
The FCC photos show the device with a USB port connected to a TerminusTech FE1.1 or FE2.1 USB hub IC, but real units seem to omit this.
Likely varying default SSIDs based on region / distribution.. *''NETGEAR'' is used *''NETGEARXX'' (''XX'' being a pre-assigned random number) is used
The power adapter included with the device is a ''NETGEAR'' MT12-Y120100-A1 (12V, 1.0A).
Some (earlier?) models have the same FCC ID but: * model number DGN1000SP * OUIs of E0:46:9A (may not be exclusive to spacious units though) * 32MiB RAM (EM63'''A'''165TS-6G) * 8MiB flash (MX25L'''6445E'''M2I-'''10G''') * "Ver. 1.3" on a sticker near the buttons (versus "Ver. 1.5" on less spacious DGN1000/DGN1000B units) * a large electrolytic capacitor between the power switch and the WiFi chip These are probably distributed by providers (certainly Orange in the UK).
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="external"> File:Netgear DGN1000 angled.jpg|angled File:Netgear DGN1000 front.jpg|front File:Netgear DGN1000 top.jpg|top File:Netgear DGN1000 bottom.jpg|bottom File:Netgear DGN1000 label.jpg|label File:Netgear DGN1000 back.jpg|back File:Netgear DGN1000 power adapter.jpg|power adapter </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:Netgear DGN1000 board top.jpg|board top File:Netgear DGN1000 AMAZON-SE.jpg|AMAZON-SE SoC File:Netgear DGN1000 Flash.jpg|Flash File:Netgear DGN1000 RAM.jpg|RAM File:Netgear DGN1000 AR9271.jpg|AR9271 File:Netgear DGN1000 Switch.jpg|AR8216 Switch File:Netgear DGN1000 presumed serial.jpg|presumed serial File:Netgear DGN1000 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] -->[[Category:User Photo's Needed]]
